message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $14,000. I think this is a great price considering the value it brings to you.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product. This is a fair price for both of us, and allows for a good margin on your end.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still looking to get a better price for my product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $13,800. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
